H0.text: Grass is best classified as a nonrenewable resource.

H1.text: Aluminum is the best classified as a nonrenewable resource.

H2.text: Sunlight is best classified as a nonrenewable resource.

H3.text: Oxygen is the resource best classified as a nonrenewable resource.

A4.text: Aluminium is almost never found in the elemental state; instead it is found in oxides or silicates.

A5.text: Most of these Al-O-OH systems are produced from ores by a variety of wet processes using acid and bases.
